ollama_response:
To download the JSON file containing the risk metrics for the stock portfolio, you can use the following command:

```
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sarah-davies/stock-portfolio-risk-metrics/main/risk_metrics.json
```

Replace `sarah-davies` with your GitHub username and replace `main` with the branch name (e.g. `main
prompt: You are an Elite quantitative trading analyst. Analyze the following trading data to transcend in profit multiplication. Generate specific trading recommendations with buy/sell actions, quantities, and prices.
